name: Scared to death!
description:
Not all monsters are evil! Protect a group of scouts from other spritis through the forest, but don't let them see you!
A group of scouts is lost in the woods, looking for their way home. Evil spirits are eager to scare them to death, quite literally. But a GOOD spirit as YOU are can't let that happen.
Protect the children until the sun rises!

Walk with right-click.

Attack with left-click.
